instruction: Find the longest word in the following sentence and replace it with another adjective of similar meaning.
input: The mouse ran across the room.
output: The agile mouse ran across the room.

instruction: Generate a single sentence summary given the following text.
input: A study conducted in 2020 shows that online education is becoming more and more popular for students. As students make the transition from traditional education to online courses, they gain more flexibility and access to innovative learning opportunities.
output: The popularity of online education is growing rapidly as students seek more flexibility and access to innovative learning opportunities.

instruction: Given a set of product features, describe what benefits the customer might be able to receive.
input: Product features: lightweight, breathable fabric, moisture wicking
output: Customers can benefit from the lightweight and breathable fabric, as well as the moisture wicking properties, which will help keep them comfortable and dry even during intense physical activity.

instruction: Rewrite the following sentence to reflect the same message but with more concise language.
input: He got off the bus when it reached its destination
output: He disembarked when the bus arrived.

instruction: Given a specific product, generate a unique selling point for the product that highlights its value.
input: Product: A cutting board set for the kitchen
output: This cutting board set is perfect for busy households, as it is durable, scratch-resistant and includes multiple sizes for flexibility in the kitchen.

instruction: Add a specific real-world example to the sentence given and explain how it relates to the sentence.
input: The website had a lot of broken links.
output: The website had a lot of broken links, such as a link to an outdated page that had recently changed URL.

instruction: Given a list of fashion items, create an outfit suggestion.
output: A casual look could be accomplished by pairing a black t-shirt with dark-wash jeans, a brown leather belt and white sneakers.

instruction: Given a set of keywords, generate a creative title for a blog post.
output: "Harnessing the Power of Social Media for Effective Marketing".

instruction: Find all of the adjectives in the following sentence and replace them with synonyms.
input: The large bird flew swiftly in the sky.
output: The immense bird glided quickly in the sky.

instruction: Given a specific writing style, revise the following paragraph such that it reflects the style.
input:
Writing style: APA 
Paragraph: 
Recently, numerous studies have proven the efficacy of online learning to be equal or even more effective when compared to traditional learning methods. Ultimately, the widespread adoption of digital education presents an exciting opportunity for learners and teachers alike.
output: Recent studies indicate that online learning is either equivalent or more effective than traditional methods (Anonymous, 2020). As digital education becomes more widespread, it presents a thrilling opportunity for both learners and teachers.

instruction: Given a description of a company, generate a line that summarizes its core values.
input: Company description: An innovative technology company that strives to bring cutting-edge solutions to customers
output: At this innovative technology company, we strive to offer cutting-edge solutions and create value for customers.

instruction: Rearrange the sentence to change its original meaning
input: The water was quickly frozen by the cold temperatures.
output: The cold temperatures quickly froze the water.

instruction: Using the text, create a poem of at least 10 lines
input: The sky was a deep blue, the horizon stretched endlessly, the stars twinkled against the night.
output:
The sky was a deep blue, 
The stars twinkled against the night,
My heart filled with love anew,
The horizon stretched endlessly in sight.

A peace descends upon me,
Beneath the night sky so grand,
The cool winds blow gently,
Calming my wandering hands.

The stars so bright and pure,
Night aloft, eternity in these halls,
Astride the clouds we do lure,
For forever and ever, night calls.

Take a breath of the whispering air,
To embrace the generosity of the sky,
Gasping the beauty so rare,
We gaze, no words to apply.

Bathing in the tender moonlight,
Cradled by the absolute still,
Awakened in such a wondrous night,
Peace, where I’m meant to fulfill.

instruction: Explain the central idea behind the lyrics for the song "A Million Dreams"
input: A million dreams are keeping me awake
output: The central idea behind the lyrics for the song "A Million Dreams" is that the dreams of a better future, of success, and of fulfillment can propel someone forward to achieve their goals in life. The song is about the motivational power of dreaming and how it can help people overcome their doubts to reach the top. It speaks to the importance of pursuing one’s dreams and striving to become the best version of oneself. The song also speaks to the beauty of dreams and the power they have to make us feel alive.

instruction: Analyze the use of metaphors in the following text
input: Her heart was a maelstrom, threatening to swallow her whole.
output: In this sentence, the metaphor of a maelstrom is used to emphasize how overwhelming the feeling in the person's heart is. The maelstrom has the sense of a powerful storm that is beyond the control of the person and is threatening to consume them completely. This metaphor helps to convey the intense emotion the person is feeling so that they can better express their inner turmoil.

output: ![alt text](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn%3AANd9GcSjXGJNJxgxovB1GJZ-z-KEYamo50gbfeJFoyMS_dikopPQ9ykF&usqp=CAU)

instruction: In 100 words or less, tell a story about the consequences of the choices people make
output: People’s lives can take an unexpected twist and turn due to the choices they make. Take John, for example. He was an engineering student with no interest in partying. But one night he decided to join his friends on a night of revelry, and ended up risking his friendship with his best friend when he cheated on Rachel with the new girl at school. Later on, he dropped out of school in order to provide financial support for his family. Even though he was able to turn things around and learn new skills in sales, he had to pay a heavy price for his misadventures — the loss of his lifelong dream to become an engineer. This story serves as a reminder that every choice carries with it consequences, and that it is important for people to consider them before making a decision.

instruction: Replace the word "angry" to make the sentence more polite.
input: The customer was angry about his order.
output: The customer was displeased about his order.

instruction: Write a Python function to generate the Fibonacci sequence up to n numbers.
Classify this sentence as either an example of Structuralism, Post-Structuralism, or Deconstruction.
input: Interpretation of a text should start by identifying its key words.
output: Structuralism.
